biotools.summary:
An Interactive Platform To Explore And Integrate Multi-Omics Data.

GraphOmics is a dashboard to integrate and explore different types of biological -omics data. Using this tool, you can map transcriptomics, proteomics and metabolomics data onto metabolic pathways.
